content.description: Starts right of Nipple Clip.  This is the hardest climb on the wall.
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall at Trapper Dome.

content.description: Begin at a short undercling/left facing block with two visible bolts just above. Climb a headwall (two bolts) to a 3 bolt belay.
content.protection: 4 bolts. Guide says gear to 3". I didn't see that. Used a black totem  between bolts 2 and 3.
content.location: A couple hundred feet right of the majority of the Sex wall routes. Look for the bolts. There are 3 routes in this upper area.

content.description: Fantastic route!  Starts just to the left of Four Play.  Steep and featured slab requires very balancy climbing.  The crux is possibly right off the ground, although the difficulties are sustained through several bolts.
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall on Trapper Dome.

content.description: Located on the far right of the Sex wall, start on top of a boulder.  Another nice warmup on good rock.
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall at Trapper Dome

content.description: This route starts just right of KY.  Easy featured face for a couple bolts leads to very thin and sustained slab climbing for the remainder.  The name of the route comes from the fact that there is a small feature resembling a nipple that can be pinched while clipping one of the bolts.
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall at Trapper Dome

content.description:
Fun route. Boy that KY is slippery!

Start at the far left end of the Sex wall.  Climb steep but featured face up to the third bolt, where the angle lessens and all the features disappear.  Crux is passing the third bolt, then sustained 5.9 to the top.  At the top, traverse right to the bolted anchor for Nipple Clip.
content.protection: 5 bolts, then traverse right to the 2 bolt anchor at the top of Nipple Clip
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall at Trapper Dome.

content.description: This route is an excellent addition to Sex Wall! The route is directly between Voyeur and Illegal in 48 States. It begins with some bouldery moves passing the first bolt. From there you gain great features passing two more bolts. As you pass the third bolt, the features begin to fade. The crux begins as you pass the fourth bolt, using a single crystal-like granite extrusion. 5.10d may feel a little sandbagged.
content.location: The route is on Trapper Dome's Sex Wall between Voyeur and Illegal in 48 States.

content.description: Located between Voyeur and Sixty Nine.  Difficult Start.
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall at Trapper Dome.

content.description: Second route from the right, starts on the left side of a large boulder.  Interesting crux right at the anchor.
content.location: This route is located on the Sex Wall at Trapper Dome
